## Matrix.useArray() method

Use a standard Javascript Array at the underlying array that this matrix scans to

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
useArray(array: any[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | any\[\] | an Array object |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
